queries.user_query: How many pcm_assembly_plant_code records do we have?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code`
queries.description: Count all records in pcm_assembly_plant_code table

queries.user_query: How many unique region values are there?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT region) as unique_count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code`

queries.user_query: How many pcm_assembly_plant_code records from the last 30 days?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as recent_count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE lastupdatedon >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
queries.description: Count records from last 30 days using partition-optimized query

queries.user_query: Show me the count of records by region
queries.expected_sql: SELECT region, COUNT(*) as count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` GROUP BY region ORDER BY count DESC

queries.user_query: Count recent pcm_assembly_plant_code records by region
queries.expected_sql: SELECT region, COUNT(*) as count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE lastupdatedon >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 90 DAY) GROUP BY region ORDER BY count DESC
queries.description: Count with multiple conditions: date filter and grouping

queries.user_query: Show me some sample pcm_assembly_plant_code records
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` LIMIT 10

queries.user_query: Show me vo code, sales code description, region from pcm_assembly_plant_code
queries.expected_sql: SELECT vo_code, sales_code_description, region FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` LIMIT 100

queries.user_query: Show me all pcm_assembly_plant_code where region is active
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE region = 'active' LIMIT 100

queries.user_query: Show me pcm_assembly_plant_code sorted by vo code
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` ORDER BY vo_code DESC LIMIT 50

queries.user_query: Show recent pcm_assembly_plant_code records that are active
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE lastupdatedon >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND region = 'active' LIMIT 100

queries.user_query: Show me pcm_assembly_plant_code from last month
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE lastupdatedon >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) LIMIT 100
queries.description: Records from last month using DATE_SUB

queries.user_query: What pcm_assembly_plant_code do we have from this year?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM lastupdatedon) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE()) LIMIT 100
queries.description: Records from current year using EXTRACT

queries.user_query: Show pcm_assembly_plant_code between January and March 2024
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE lastupdatedon BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-03-31' LIMIT 100

queries.user_query: Show me pcm_assembly_plant_code from the last 7 days
queries.expected_sql: SELECT * FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE lastupdatedon >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY lastupdatedon DESC LIMIT 100

queries.user_query: How many pcm_assembly_plant_code per month this year?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC(lastupdatedon, MONTH) as month, COUNT(*) as count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_assembly_plant_code` WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM lastupdatedon) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE()) GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
queries.description: Group by month for current year

queries.user_query: What is the total national blend code?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT SUM(national_blend_code) as total_national_blend_code FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_avs_vims`

queries.user_query: What is the average national blend code?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT AVG(national_blend_code) as avg_national_blend_code FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_avs_vims`

queries.user_query: What are the minimum and maximum national blend code values?
queries.expected_sql: SELECT MIN(national_blend_code) as min_national_blend_code, MAX(national_blend_code) as max_national_blend_code FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_avs_vims`

queries.user_query: Count pcm_avs_vims by order type
queries.expected_sql: SELECT order_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_avs_vims` GROUP BY order_type ORDER BY count DESC

queries.user_query: Show me statistics of national blend code by order type
queries.expected_sql: SELECT order_type, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(national_blend_code) as total, AVG(national_blend_code) as average, MIN(national_blend_code) as minimum, MAX(national_blend_code) as maximum FROM `ford-c478f92f60f6ef55c82d7136.uqm.pcm_avs_vims` GROUP BY order_type ORDER BY total DESC
